author: Worker_Joe
title: Best LEGO game EVER!
review:
I have been a BETA Tester since July and I love the game! It has so much stuff that it is impossible to beat it all. Plus they add new stuff each month!

Pros

-Unlimited Bricks

-Minifig customization

-Thousands of things to do

-MMOG

-Everything else!

Cons

-You can't order your minifig..

-No sets with some of the pieces featured in the game.

author: Exus
title: Join LEGO Universe, and save imagination!
review:
This was a fun game, and is very addicting.


  • Pros:
  • Fun
  • Lots of things to do!
  • Design your own minifig, which is fun
  • Factions allow you to go through a variety of fun teams

  • Cons:
  • The picture makes the game look like it comes in a big detailed box. It doesn't.
  • The game's quests are rather simple
  • No bank, and there's tons of stuff to collect

Overview: If your a hardcore gamer, don't get this. There's no PVP or level system. If you hate trolls, don't get it either. There's been a successful train in one spawn area for 5 days now, and you can't kill one enemy without a pack defeating you, and a ton of kill stealers.

This game, however, is very fun. Mind the kill stealers and trainers, you can have a really fun time, especially with the Best Friends feature, good teamwork when it comes to the survival minigame and dragon minigame, and make the minifigure you played with when you were little (Lots of fun parts to start, lots of cool ones later too!). Factions are fun, because if you like up close fights, Setinel and Venture. Long distance fighters will enjoy Paradox and Assembly.


Final Score: 9/10, 10/10 if there was a way to stop kill stealing, and a way for the LU Team to shut down the train.

author: GBP_Chris
title: Incredible Game - Maybe even the best!
review:
This game is incredible! From the Venture Explorer to the battlefields of Crux Prime to the Imagination at Nexus Tower, every part of the game is INCREDIBLE! The best function for pro builders is the property building, where not only do you have a large supply of bricks both new and classic, but when you finish, you can program them to come to life! The battles and weapons are awesome as well. Avant Gardens Survival and Forbidden Valley Dragon battle are the best mini games of the whole universe! Buy if you can

(Did I mention the is racing better than Lego racers or Lego Racers 2?)
